data.title: Aarhus University Library
data.text:
Focus

Sharpen your knowledge on copyright!

Do you need an overview of resources that are OK to use in your assignment? For example pictures, graphics, icons, sound etc.?

Watch the movie "How to use images in your thesis", take the quiz and find the overview of resources you are allowed to use.

Focus

Search for published student projects in our library system

As a student or employee at Aarhus University you can search for student projects from AU, e.g. theses, Masterâ€™s theses and bachelor projects from AU. Assignments that the students have given permission for others at AU to search for and read.

You are also able to search for student projects from Copenhagen University and Roskilde University.

Note: To get access to electronic theses etc. from AU, you must:

1. be logged in to the library system as a student or an employee at AU

AND

2. be connected to AUs Eduroam or AUs VPN
